actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for the induction of individuals, during the period beginning July 1, 1977, and ending June 30, 1979, for training and service in the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Authorizes the induction of individuals into the armed forces under the Military Selective Service Act beginning on July 1, 1977 and ending June 30, 1979.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the induction of individuals, during the period beginning July 1, 1977, and ending June 30, 1979, for training and service in the Armed Forces.
